ol.li: USD 480 COVID 19 Food Service Change in Schedule and Location

img.alt: USD 480 COVID 19 Food Service Change in Schedule and Location
img.div:
USD 480 COVID 19 Food Service Change in Schedule and Location
Public Relations
Thursday, April 16, 2020
img.p: Beginning April 20th, 2020, USD 480 will be implementing the following changes to our Food Service locations:
We will continue to have buses/district vehicles at the following addresses:

We will no longer have a bus at Prairie View or Meadowlark Elementary, we will however be offering drive up service at each of the buildings, to include a hot meal option. Meadowlark will serve on the West side of the building and Prairie View on the North, both from Door #9.

We will also be changing our serving days. We will serve on Monday, Wednesday and Friday, providing two days of meals on Monday and Wednesday and one on Friday. Hot meals will only be available at Prairie View and Meadowlark for Monday, Wednesday and Friday. Meals provided for Tuesday and Thursday will continue to be sack lunch.
Please come prepared with a bag or box to transport meals in as we will not have any available.
Serving times will remain the same.

div.p:
Liberal USD 480
7 Parkway Blvd.
Liberal, KS 67901
Phone: 620-604-1010

U.S.D. 480 Liberal does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the nondiscrimination policies:
Mrs. Kristyn Reust Director of Human Resources 620-604-1010 kristyn.reust@usd480.net
